sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext'; const AboutPage = () => { const { t } = useLanguage(); const teamMembers = [ { name: 'David Chen', title: 'CEO & Founder', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=687&q=80', bio: 'Former investment banker with 15+ years of experience in financial services.' }, { name: 'Sarah Wong', title: 'CTO', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=687&q=80', bio: 'Technology leader with expertise in AI and financial platforms.' }, { name: 'Michael Lee', title: 'Head of Product', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=687&q=80', bio: 'Product strategist focused on user experience and market growth.' } ]; const values = [ { title: 'Innovation', description: 'We continuously push the boundaries of financial technology to deliver cutting-edge solutions.', icon: 'fas fa-lightbulb' }, { title: 'Trust', description: 'Building lasting relationships through transparency, security, and reliable service.', icon: 'fas fa-shield-alt' }, { title: 'Excellence', description: 'Committed to delivering the highest quality financial advisory services and platform experience.', icon: 'fas fa-star' }, { title: 'Community', description: 'Fostering a supportive network of advisors and clients for mutual growth and success.', icon: 'fas fa-users' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{t('about.title')}

We're revolutionizing the financial advisory industry by connecting clients with the perfect advisors through AI-powered matching technology.

{/* Our Story */}

{t('about.story')}

Founded in 2020, Persona Centric was born from a simple observation: finding the right financial advisor was too difficult, and the process was often inefficient and impersonal.

Our founders, experienced in both technology and finance, saw an opportunity to leverage AI and data science to create a more intelligent, personalized matching system that would benefit both clients and advisors.

Today, we've helped thousands of clients find their perfect financial advisors, and enabled hundreds of advisors to grow their practices more efficiently.

{/* Mission & Vision */}

{t('about.mission')}

Our Mission

To democratize access to quality financial advice by making it easier for clients to find the right advisors, and for advisors to connect with clients who need their expertise.

Our Vision

To become the world's leading platform for financial advisory matching, powered by AI and driven by the success of our community of advisors and clients.

{/* Our Values */}

{t('about.values')}

{values.map((value, index) => (

{value.title}

{value.description}

))}
{/* Our Team */}

{t('about.team')}

Meet the passionate team behind Persona Centric

{teamMembers.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.title}

{member.bio}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of clients and advisors who trust Persona Centric

Find Your Advisor Become an Advisor
); }; export default AboutPage;
